name: Sentinel-2-download
tagline: Automatic download of Sentinel-2 L1C data from ESA (through wget)
body:
Welcome to Sentinel-2-Download pages.

This tool written in Python language will help you automatically download Sentinel-2 data from the ESA web site. 

There is a short user manual here : https://github.com/olivierhagolle/Sentinel-2-download/blob/master/README.md

You may directly read the code here : https://github.com/olivierhagolle/Sentinel-2-download
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
